description.overview: This is a functional fullstack web application inspired by Jira that utilizes a Kanban board system for task management.
features: Kanban Board: Visualize workflows with columns representing stages Backlog, In Progress, In QA, and Done. Drag and drop functionality allows for intuitive movement of tasks between stages.
Task Management: Create, edit, and manage tasks with details like title, descriptions, and assignees (users)
User Authentication: SSO authentication for access control
description.timespan: Less than a week in August 2023
description.stack: TypeScript, HTML, CSS, Next.js, PostgreSQL, GraphQL, Apollo, Prisma

description.overview: This is my personal website that I designed and implemented to showcase my projects and frontend expertise
features: Responsive Design: Adapts seamlessly to different devices
Visually Engaging UX: Captivates with smooth animations and parallax scrolling
Project Showcase: Presents my personal projects at length
description.timespan: Does anyone ever stop updating their portfolio?
description.stack: Javascript, Liquid, HTML, CSS, GSAP, Lenis, Jekyll

description.overview: This is a simple onboarding wizard for meal plan selection inspired by Fresh Meal Plan
features: User Signup: Validates user's email and zip code
Meal Plan Showcase: Presents available meal plans which can be added to the cart
Cart Popup: Displays all items added, allows users to edit quantities or remove items before checkout
